idea-plugin.name: FRC Project Manager [UNOFFICIAL]
idea-plugin.description:
The FRC Project Template Manager [UNOFFICIAL] is a plugin that can clone FRC projects, help you create new Subsystems, Commands, etc.
You must have GIT installed on your computer.
Warning: This plugin only works on windows for now.

This plugin has been created by Hector Canizales, a team member from Tecbot 3158 First Robotics Competition For Inspiration and Recognition of Science and Technology. (FRC, FIRST)
